column2: Source: City of Toronto summary budget documents. The general quality and availability of this data source is poor. We were unable to obtain matching staffing complement data for 2013. Caution: The staffing dataset for 2016, and most datasets before 2011, are pre-council approved. Roughly estimated re-allocations for continuity have been applied to the earlier years. 2017 staffing figures currently include both operating and capital positions. We will replace those with operating-only positions once the City releases that data.
